description: Describes the security policy that is attached to your server or SFTP connector. The response contains a description of the security policy's properties. For more information about security policies, see Working with security policies for servers or Working with security policies for SFTP connectors.

parameters.name: SecurityPolicyName
parameters.description: Specify the text name of the security policy for which you want the details.

nested_items.name: SecurityPolicy
nested_items.description: An array containing the properties of the security policy.

nested_items.name: Fips
nested_items.description: Specifies whether this policy enables Federal Information Processing Standards (FIPS). This parameter applies to both server and connector security policies.

nested_items.name: SecurityPolicyName
nested_items.description: The text name of the specified security policy.

nested_items.name: SshCiphers
nested_items.description: Lists the enabled Secure Shell (SSH) cipher encryption algorithms in the security policy that is attached to the server or connector. This parameter applies to both server and connector security policies.

nested_items.name: SshKexs
nested_items.description: Lists the enabled SSH key exchange (KEX) encryption algorithms in the security policy that is attached to the server or connector. This parameter applies to both server and connector security policies.

nested_items.name: SshMacs
nested_items.description: Lists the enabled SSH message authentication code (MAC) encryption algorithms in the security policy that is attached to the server or connector. This parameter applies to both server and connector security policies.

nested_items.name: TlsCiphers
nested_items.description: Lists the enabled Transport Layer Security (TLS) cipher encryption algorithms in the security policy that is attached to the server.

nested_items.name: SshHostKeyAlgorithms
nested_items.description: Lists the host key algorithms for the security policy.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: The resource type to which the security policy applies, either server or connector.

nested_items.name: Protocols
nested_items.description: Lists the file transfer protocols that the security policy applies to.
